Desc.eng: What do you want from a fraud like me?
What fraud? You are a gifted scientist.
YES, I AM! And what do I? I distill Essences. That's all!
And is this a problem becauseâ€¦?
Because no one takes me seriously without a proper degree. Although I learned everything the hard way. Blowing up laboratories! Making smelly, bubbling things!
I think you could go on for a while. We have to go.
